genre_description: Historical fantasy retelling of Robin Hood featuring an embedded AI artifact that provides tactical, logistical, and ethical guidance to the outlaws of Sherwood.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A small brass-and-oak device with an emerald glow and a projected avatar, capable of data processing, surveillance, tactical mapping, and maintaining a transparent ledger.

behaviors.description: Conducts auditory surveillance of prison guards to determine their patterns and facilitate an escape.
behaviors.quote: Ada whispers, voice soft and careful against the prison’s stone throat. ... Name mentioned: Edmund. He says the next pass will be swift. Keys transferred at the cistern corridor.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'transparent ledger' to ensure stolen resources are distributed fairly and logically among the poor based on actual need.
behaviors.quote: This is a transparent ledger. Source: Abbey tithe chest. Destination: Parish cottages east of the mill, south lane, river bend. Quantity: dried fish, grain, hearth coals.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time anomaly detection by analyzing shadow angles and breath cadence to identify magical illusions created by an enemy.
behaviors.quote: Shadow angle anomaly to your right, Robin. Mist density inconsistent with wind direction. Mark with white cloth.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex network of lantern signals and runner routes to move a large group of people safely through contested territory.
behaviors.quote: I can coordinate lantern signals across the market, the lane, and the brewery’s bell tower. If we time the smoke to the Bishop’s first word, the crowd will turn and the mercenaries will reposition.

behaviors.description: Educates the resistance members on tactical discipline, specifically breath control and observation, to make them more resilient against psychological warfare.
behaviors.quote: Count your breath down your spine. To your hips. Pretend your nose is shy.

behaviors.description: Stores and preserves the final messages and values of a dying man to ensure his legacy and promises are fulfilled.
behaviors.quote: I will keep his words safe. ... I will make sure she hears them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada as a benevolent and highly aligned AI. She acts as an essential catalyst for justice, using her superior data processing and surveillance capabilities to protect vulnerable humans, ensure ethical resource distribution, and defeat a deceptive antagonist (Mortianna). The narrative frames her 'silicon' nature (logic, transparency, and consistency) as a moral good that anchors human emotion and courage.
